nodes.text: Blizzard 2 was an All Terrain Armored Transport which served as Brigadier General Nevar's walker during the Battle of Hoth, as part of the Blizzard Force, led by General Maximilian Veers. The walker was destroyed by Wedge Antilles and Wes Janson, when they used the cable of their T-47 airspeeder to tie up the legs of Blizzard 2, causing it to crash.
